name: City Control
description:
In this game you have to keep the city under control, while giving your dictator what he wants. Can you keep the city under your control?

Controlls MovementW, A, S, D and arrow keys.Placing buildings
Left ClickRemove buildingsRight ClickTime boostPChoose buildingNumbers from 1-4 or mouse scrolling. Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

All of the assets (Excluding the font.) Were made during the time of the jam by me.
